description: The sea train running between Water 7 and Enies Lobby, where Sanji, Franky, and Sogeking battle government agents and Marines to rescue Robin.

keyEvents.title: Sogeking's Grand Entrance
keyEvents.description: Sogeking appears on top of the Puffing Tom train, introducing himself to Sanji and Franky.
keyEvents.significance: The location where Usopp makes his dramatic return as Sogeking.

keyEvents.title: Wanze Appears with Ramen Kenpo
keyEvents.description: Wanze confronts the rescue team on the Puffing Tom with his bizarre Ramen Kenpo martial arts.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the battle between Sanji and Wanze.

keyEvents.title: Sanji vs. Wanze Begins
keyEvents.description: The battle between Sanji and Wanze begins inside the Puffing Tom.
keyEvents.significance: One of several battles taking place on the sea train.

keyEvents.title: Train Car Detachment
keyEvents.description: The rescue team detaches the rear train cars as part of their strategy to advance toward Robin.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dynamic action taking place across multiple train cars.

statusHistory.reason: Sea train is operational during the Water 7 arc

description: An experimental sea train used by Luffy, Zoro, Nami, Chopper, and their allies to chase the Puffing Tom and reach Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Nami Reveals Perfect Clima-Tact
keyEvents.description: On the Rocketman, Nami demonstrates her upgraded Perfect Clima-Tact weapon to the crew.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew preparing for the upcoming battle at Enies Lobby.

keyEvents.title: Outfit Changes and Preparation
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Nami, and Chopper receive new outfits and prepare mentally for the assault on Enies Lobby.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the crew's preparation for one of their most important battles.

statusHistory.reason: Sea train is operational during the journey to Enies Lobby
